title: Ep 43: The PUR-fect Episode
description:
Today's proceedings:  We read about a terrible bedroom accident, a pair of roommates have very different ideas on what to do with their spare bedroom, a lady makes a whoopsies texting her mom instead of her significant other, and a man has an awkward work experience after a night filled with new experiences. More importantly Christian shows off why he is the "Creative One" on the podcast with a script reading from his new screenplay.  

Get your Sheesh Merch here! http://etsy.com/shop/Judgiespodcast 

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/judgiespod   

Follow us on Instagram: https://instagram.com/judgiespod   

Music by: Iván  https://open.spotify.com/artist/0dlYkMquTDLwn0Wh3A8U4s?si=5ayT43JfRVux2qrKpOkvpg   

Logo/Designs by:  https://www.youtube.com/user/lilwillis121 


Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/the-judgies/support

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
